GRANTS

NIH/NHGRI U01 for RFA-HG-12-016 # U01 HG007436 (PI: Bustamante and Plon)

6/1/2013 - 5/31/2017

5% effort (Co-Investigator)

Clinically Relevant Genome Variation Database

NIH/NHGRI (RFA-RM-12-019) # R01MH101814 (PI: Dermitzakis/McCarthy/Bustamante/Guigo)

08/01/2013-07/31/2016

7% effort (Co-Investigator)

Methods for high-resolution analysis of genetic effects on gene expression This project is for the second phase of statistical analyses as part of the GTEx project

Edward Mallinckrodt Junior Research Grant

10/1/2012 – 9/30/2014

4% effort

Expression response to environment in coronary artery smooth muscle cells This project is to investigate transcriptome responses to serum-starvation in human coronary artery smooth muscle cells using RNA-sequencing data. (In collaboration with Tom Quertermous)
